original_text:
In the abundance of your trade
    you were filled with violence in your midst, and you sinned;
so I cast you as a profane thing from the mountain of God,
    and I destroyed you, O guardian cherub,
    from the midst of the stones of fire.
korean_text: 네 무역이 많으므로 네 가운데에 강포가 가득하여 네가 범죄하였도다 너 지키는 그룹아 그러므로 내가 너를 더럽게 여겨 하나님의 산에서 쫓아냈고 불타는 돌들 사이에서 멸하였도다

sentences.original_text: In the abundance of your trade
you were filled with violence in your midst
so I cast you as a profane thing
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 내가 너를 속된 것으로 던졌노라

sentences.original_text: from the midst of the stones of fire
